bwwExcerpt: Despite occasional staging touches - the sounds of fireworks and playing children always seem to surge at momentous times - the show has a certain tragic inevitability. It's a flawed but compelling picture of Southern discomfort.

keyPhrases.quote: It's a flawed but compelling picture of Southern discomfort.
